find_best_hyperparameters A helper utility to find best hyperparameters Parameters ———- max_evals : int, optional

maximum number of hyperparameters combinations to try, by default 100

Returns

data_split_target_labels A helper function to seperate Independent and target column Parameters ———- df : pd.DataFrame

the dataframe to separate Independent and dependent features

the name of target values in the df dataframe
